title: Publish Draft Version 34

requirements.text: Update the appâ€™s published version identifier to Draft 34 by changing the single source of truth constants in frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts so the UI reflects that Draft 34 is the currently published draft (and set LIVE_VERSION_DATE to the publish date in YYYY-MM-DD format).

quotes: Yes now fine, publish draft version 34

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts exports LIVE_VERSION with the exact string value 'Draft 34'.
frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts exports LIVE_VERSION_DATE as a YYYY-MM-DD string matching the Draft 34 publish date.
After building the frontend, any UI location that displays the live/draft version shows Draft 34 (no remaining Draft 32 references used for live version display).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources).
Do not modify immutable hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend must remain single-actor (no additional canisters/services).
nonGoals: Do not change TTS/voice behavior (English-only TTS is already approved as working).
Do not introduce new features beyond updating the published draft version identifier.
Do not change deployment tooling or add CI/CD automation.
